snippet.title: Rayman Garden PLUS: Story Mode Update - First Look Trailer | Rayman Alive x RUNI Showcase 2022
snippet.description:
Game Jolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/RaymanGardenPlus/622289

Rayman Garden PLUS, the remake of the first mobile Rayman game, will get its own story mode in the 2.0 update!

Mr. Flame has stolen PLUS, a mystical artifact that preserves the balance of Magical Gardens! Red monsters have invaded the home of Rayman and his friends, and now it is time for them to fight back! Rayman and Lua will have to collect all the lums, restore balance in each of the gardens and defeat Mr. Flame!

In our final big update for our first fan game, we would like to realize all our crazy ideas that we once wanted to implement in such a unique Rayman universe, so the walkthrough of the storyline will not be long, but very surprising and unusual. However, the story of Rayman Garden PLUS does not end there. The events of the game will be the prologue for our next project, Barbara Journey: The Fallen Angels!

Follow us:

VK: https://vk.com/raymanuniverse

#Rayman​ #Ubisoft​ #UbiCommunity​ #RaymanUniverse #RaymanAlive
